name: St. Therese Phan Thi Thanh

locations.description: Vietnamese laywoman martyred for her faith

summary: Therese Phan Thi Thanh was a Vietnamese laywoman and mother who was martyred for her faith during the persecution of Christians in Vietnam. She refused to renounce her faith despite threats and was executed. She is one of the Martyrs of Vietnam, canonized in 1988, and is remembered for her courage and devotion.
